title: Table 42
description: A modern and responsive restaurant website with an interactive menu, cart, checkout, and reservation features. Built using React and Node.js with MongoDB integration.

title: HomeChef
description: A chef booking platform allowing users to book professional chefs for home-cooked meals. Developed using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A React-based weather dashboard app that displays real-time weather data and 5-day forecasts using the OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Railways Ticket Reservation System
description: A simple and intuitive web-based ticket reservation system for trains. Users can search trains, check seat availability, and proceed with booking.
